esting month, good look all

Frank-S

---- In EVP-ITC@yahoog=
roups .com, eamonn mgherbi <eamonnmgherbi@ ...> wrote:
>
> Hey All
> 
> App=
arently in astrological terms there is some kind of new turn, i.e. movement=
 of planets atmoshperic change or something that is happening which start d=
uring the month of August...gets intense from the 15th onwards till the 9th=
 of September.
> 
> I may be way off the point...and I think I am, but im s=
ure atmospheric conditions effect the quality of communications with these =
guys. maybe they are preparing us all that a bridge will be easier to build=
 on these dates..again dont shoot me on this because I could be so damn wro=
ng.
> 
> just a thought
> 
> E
> 
> 
> 
>

> To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups .=
com
> Sent: Friday, 14 August, 2009 14:10:38
> Subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Train=
ing?

> =A0 
> 
> 
> ____________ _________ _________ __
> 
> did you pla=
y your file back ?=A0 if you recorded it I would bet there was all kinds of=
 info on it, sometimes they start, at least for me, they started like more =
evp's=A0 then real time, now they do both, and at times,=A0they are all cha=
ting at once it seems.=A0 I think they are talking to each other, not just =
to us. sf
> 
> In a message dated 8/14/2009 8:53:51 A.M. Eastern Daylight T=
ime, cozykat2003@ yahoo.com writes:
> =A0 
> >I have had a couple sessions =
now and still have not heard anything.=A0 I am wondering too if the spirits=
 are still listening to me and letting me get my "feet wet" before they wil=
l speak to me.=A0 I have been polite and have used both AM and FM bands.=A0=
 I tell them who I am, the day, time and location.=A0 I let them know my pu=
rpose for communicating and I ask for their help.=A0 I am being patient wit=
h the process.
> >
> >
> >
> >
> ____________ _________ _________ __
> From=
: mrscaptainjack2 <jjkamp@netzero. com>
> >To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups .com
> >=
Sent: Friday, August 14, 2009 1:38:17 AM
> >Subject: [EVP-ITC] Training?
> =
>
> >=A0 
> >Thanks so much, Misty. I will see if I can ask them to speak a=
s one, because I think you hit the nail right on the head -- I do hear them=
 speaking over each other, half in male, half in female, so maybe things wo=
uld improve like you said if they organized into one collective voice. Can =
they still answer questions about individuals this way, or are you limited =
to generalized queries?
> >
> >Regarding your statement: "Quite often when =
a new speaker
> >comes forth a bit of a training session can be heard for h=
ow they can
> >speak so that my physical self can hear what is said." So by=
 this, do you mean it's possible it takes a couple of sessions for the enti=
ty to master this new method of communication? For instance, I got my grand=
mother' s name (among others) during Tuesday's session, but she said nothin=
g, wouldn't answer our questions; Wednesday, she suddenly started talking a=
nd was the primary person we communicated with, even correctly answered my =
mother's questions about her childhood pets. Could this be because there's =
a learning curve involved with talking through the radio? Does it take a se=
ssion or two before they "get the hang of it"? Or is it all dependent on my=
 skills?
> >
> >Oh, and wanted to say I'm going out tomorrow to buy all the=
 canned goods at the grocery store in anticipation of the nuclear winter we=
 are about to endure... Just kidding. Hearing about all that stuff they are=
 predicting, it does make me wonder, though, why they would go to such trou=
ble to tell you all that again and again -- what's to gain from it? It's no=
t stirring anybody up. 
> >
> >
>
